attributes.action: Reverse my EU referendum vote. I voted "Leave" now want to change to "Remain"
attributes.additional_details:
There's many like me, who didn't fully understand the consequences of their leave vote. We believed the lies told by the "Leave Campaign" and as it stands now, they don't have a clue or any plan in place to lead us to a be a better Country. Just after the vote results, they back paddled on the most important promised they made as Hilary Benn says "Brexit would not mean big drop in immigration"
and Nigel Farage says  "£350 million pledge to fund the NHS was 'a mistake'.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to make provisions to reverse my EU Referendum vote from "Leave" to "Remain" in the EU

rejection.details:
If you would like there to be a second referendum, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133753
